services.title: Payer XYZ Appointment Booking Decision Support
services.description: Indicates coverage requirements associated with draft orders, including expectations for prior authorization, recommended therapy alternatives, etc.

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Coverage Information
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Information related to the patient's coverage, including whether a scheduled service is covered, requires prior authorization, is approved without seeking prior authorization, and/or requires additional documentation or data collection

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Insurance Updates
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Allows a provider to receive updates to the patient's coverage information from the payer (e.g. expiry date, coverage extensions)

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Clinical Reminders
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Alerts that a patient is due for certain screening or other therapy (based on payer recorded date of last intervention) that could potentially be performed at the time of the appointment, or for which an additional appointment might be made

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Duplicate Therapy
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Alerts that the service being booked is in close proximity to an already delivered or scheduled service and may be unnecessary

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Off Guideline
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Alerts that a proposed appointment might be counter to a best-practice guideline, with opportunity to review the guideline

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Guidelines
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Indication that there is a guideline available for the proposed appointment (with an option to view)

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Cost Information
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Information about the anticipated cost to the patient for the service being scheduled based on their coverage

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Claim Guidance
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Information about what steps need to be taken to submit a claim for the service

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Network Information
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Information about in-network providers that could deliver the scheduled service (or in-network alternatives for an order directed out-of-network)

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Appropriate use
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Guidance on whether appropriate-use documentation is needed

davinci-crd.configuration-options.name: Maximum cards
davinci-crd.configuration-options.description: Indicates the maximum number of cards to be returned from the service.  The services will prioritize cards such as highest priority ones are delivered
